required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on March 04, 2022
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multi-center and Multi-modal Deep Learning Study of Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Multi-center and Multi-modal Deep Learning Study of Diagnosis, Therapeutic Outcome and Prognosis of Gastric Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: First Hospital of China Medical University

collaborator.agency: The Second Hospital of Shandong University
The General Hospital of Fushun Mining Bureau
The fourth People's Hospital of Changzhou
First Hospital of Jinzhou Medical University

clinical_study.source: First Hospital of China Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: To assist postoperative pathological diagnosis and classification of gastric cancer by machine learning; To improve the accuracy of pathological diagnosis of gastric cancer by machine learning; To predict the effectiveness of treatment for gastric cancer by deep learning; To construct a model to predict the survival of gastric cancer patients by multimodal deep learning.

primary_outcome.description: To measure the maximum diameter of tumor on preoperative enhanced abdominal CT of patients with gastric cancer.
To assess the growth pattern on preoperative enhanced abdominal CT of patients with gastric cancer, including endophytic, exophytic and mixed.
To assess the enhancement pattern on preoperative enhanced abdominal CT of patients with gastric cancer, including homogeneous and heterogeneous.
To assess the enhancement degree on preoperative enhanced abdominal CT of patients with gastric cancer, including hypoenhancement, isoenhancement and hyperenhancement.
To obtain the nucleus size of postoperative H&E stained sections and slides of gastric cancer by deep learning.
To obtain the nucleus shape of postoperative H&E stained sections and slides of gastric cancer by deep learning.
To obtain the distribution of pixel intensity of postoperative H&E stained sections and slides of gastric cancer by deep learning.
To obtain the texture of nuclei of postoperative H&E stained sections and slides of gastric cancer by deep learning.

secondary_outcome.description: To analyze the survival status of patients with gastric cancer, involving dead and alive.
To calculate the overall survival of patients with gastric cancer based on days to death and days to last follow-up.
To calculate the days to recurrence/metastasis of patients with gastric cancer.

arm_group.description: Based on the inclusion criteria, 2000 gastric cancer patients will be recruited in the analysis. And a model will be constructed based on deep learning.
Based on the inclusion criteria, 1000 gastric cancer patients will be recruited in this group to verify the sensitivity and specificity of the constructed model.
Based on the inclusion criteria, 300 gastric cancer patients from 5 other medical centers will be recruited in this group to verify the sensitivity and specificity of the constructed model.

intervention.intervention_name: The whole abdomen contrast-enhanced CT scan
intervention.description: All the participants were measured by the whole abdomen contrast-enhanced CT scan.
HE pathological examination was performed on all specimens of enrolled patients.

study_pop.textblock: 3000 gastric cancer patients will participate in the phase I study, they will be divided into training group and internal validation group. 300 gastric cancer patients in five other medical centers will form the external validation group.
